export const Message = () => (
  <motion.p
    animate={{opacity: [0, 0.7], y: [-10, 0]}}
    transition={{delay: 0.2}}
    className="max-w-sm mx-auto md:text-sm text-xs pt-8"
  >
    If you don't see the email after a few minutes, you might check your spam
    folder or other filters and add <code>{supportEmail}</code> to your
    contacts.
  </motion.p>
)

export const container = {
  hidden: {opacity: 0},
  show: {
    opacity: 1,
    transition: {
      staggerChildren: 0.5,
      duration: 1,
    },
  },
}

import config from 'config'
import Layout from '../components/app/layout'
import Image from 'next/image'
import {motion} from 'framer-motion'

export default ({children}) => (
  <Layout footer={null}>
    <motion.div
      variants={container}
      initial="hidden"
      animate="show"
      className="mx-auto py-24 text-center max-w-xl relative"

      {children}
    </motion.div>
  </Layout>
)
